document.full_text: kuwaiti police dogs sniffed out plastic explosives hidden in a pickup truck that was trying to enter an industrial seaport in the gulf arab state, security officials said on monday.
document.title: dogs sniff out explosives in truck at kuwaiti port
lines_and_colors: kuwaiti police dogs sniffed out plastic explosives hidden in a pickup truck that was trying to enter an industrial seaport in the gulf arab state, security officials said on monday.
